keywords.indexterm: DITA Map to PDF WYSIWYG Transformation Tracked changes

body.p: The comments and tracked changes can be made visible in the PDF output by setting the show.changes.and.comments transformation parameter to yes. They will be available in the merged map as XML elements. See the debugging section to learn about the merged map.
